√pyā 'fill up'

present: [4.] pyā́yate etc. V.+  

perfect: pipye?  papye  

aorist: [1.] apyāyi   -- [5.] pyāyiṣīmahi   -- [6.] pyāsiṣīmahi  

[future: pyāsyate  pyāyiṣyate  pyātā  pyāyitā  ]

verbal: pyāta  pyāna  

secondary: causative: pyāyáyati etc. AV.+  pyāyáyate etc.  pyāyayiṣṭhās  pyāyyáte etc. B.+  

derivatives: -pyāya  -pyāyin C.  -pyāyya E.  -pyā́yana B.+  -pyāyayitṛ B.  

Is a secondary root-form from √pi/pī.
